hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Game Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Phantom Ganon is a big Louisa May Alcott fan.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #8# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Barinade#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple GS Level Island Courtyard

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Kokiri Sword#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Kokiri Sword#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #the Claim Check#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Save your future, end the Happy Mask Salesman.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Magic Meter#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Left Invisible Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Hylian Shield# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple MQ GS Freestanding Key Area

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Compass Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Jail Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: What is a Hylian? A miserable little pile of secrets!

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Top

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #0# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #the Song of Storms#.
